name: Perfico
tag_list: personalised, personalized, gifts, india, online, ecommerce, innovative, design, startup
overview:
Perfico (www.perfico.com) was started in 2011 with the goal of making Personalised Gift giving in India hip, exciting, convenient and fun. Our team has a long history in the Decoration of high-end Glass and Ceramic Tableware.

We strive to be innovative with our products and our designs. We are constantly developing new products and ideas that we hope our customers will truly love. Every gift and design is created with a particular recipient, or occasion in mind. If the end product is not good enough to give to someone in our own family, then it’s not good enough for our customers. Every product we ship goes through a rigorous quality check. We want our customers to absolutely love each product we ship!

Customers are always #1 at Perfico. It’s quite simple actually. Without them, we wouldn’t exist!

We strive to serve each and every customer in the best possible way we can. We believe that gift giving is an experience, and not just a process. We continue to strive to make that experience as easy, simple and pleasurable as possible.
